alert.note: Alert for Craighead; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 8:15AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Craighead and northeastern Poinsett Counties through 845 AM CDT... At 815 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cash, or 9 miles southwest of Jonesboro, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jonesboro, Trumann, Harrisburg, Bay, Weiner, Cash, Greenfield, Hergett, Apt, Tulot, Valley View, Weona Junction, Weona, Hatchie Coon, Gum Point, Maple Grove, Promised Land, Cary, Judd Hill and Lunsford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
